sent.orig: My father was a historian and his specially was the history of Germany.
sent.trans: 我的父亲是名历史学家，他的专业是德国史。

sent.orig: Alexander Solzhenitsyn (1918 -- ), Soviet novelist and historian.
sent.trans: 亚历山大-索尔仁尼琴(1918-)，苏联小说家，历史学家。

sent.orig: Allan Lichtman is the a presidential historian at American University in Washington.
sent.trans: Allan Lichtman是华盛顿美国大学的一位总统历史学家。

sent.orig: The historian explored the causes of the revolution.
sent.trans: 该历史学家探究了这次革命的根源。

sent.orig: A good historian must have an academic mind.
sent.trans: 出色的历史学家须有学术头脑。
